name: Qrazy Train
description: Qrazy Train is a TGA Genetics creation whose crazy name refers to the complex genetics in this Trainwreck, Trinity, Purple Urkle and Space Queen mix. Its diversity comes out in the strain’s unique flavor that includes spice and fruit notes. These flowers usually have deep amber-toned hairs and some purple coloration. A true hybrid, this train will have you feeling mellow and alert.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Uplifted, Happy, Hungry, Aroused, Stress, Depression, Pain, Headaches, Nausea, Dry Mouth, Headache, Dry Eyes, Dizzy, Paranoid
